actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to prohibit Federal motor vehicle safety standards which require shoulder belts.

summary.text: Amends the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to stipulate that no motor vehicle safety standard may require shoulder belts. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to amend the Federal motor safety standard numbered 208 to bring such standard into conformity with this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to prohibit Federal motor vehicle safety standards which require shoulder belts.
